original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at 326.90/327.10 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 326.90/327.10 to the US dollar on Wednesday, from 326.90/327.00 the previous day, dealers said.
The Colombo Stock Exchange was trading down; The All Share Price Index was down 0.51 percent at 10,818. The S&P SL20 was down 0.32 at 3,129.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 was quoted at 13.85/95 percent from 13.85/14.00 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 was quoted at 13.85/95 percent from 13.85/14.05 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 was quoted at 14.10/20 percent from 14.10/20 percent. (Colombo/Dec13/2023)
